How to give yourself staff/owner/mod/admin etc..

Enjoy please download

item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

owner_sean1:

I do not know how and have the time…

Ctrl+Print Screen then go into paint or something and do Ctrl+V and it’ll paste a screenshot of your screen and just then crop what you want so you don’t have huge images. Takes no more than 5 minutes.

item.title: SJScape 525 source release v1
item.dc:creator: @owner_sean1 owner_sean1
item.description:
@owner_sean1 wrote:

Heres everything you need

Hello! Here’s DragonScape 525 IP Changer!

Many People needed this, But as it got baisicly lost, many 525’s Died, but now DragonKing Made a New on and I Uploaded. Me and DragonKing know Each other well.

Updates in v3:
CUSTOMS: (You can make you Own!); User>Item/s>(all codes, ID’s, Make your own, Take a look at the other first).
Dragon Cape
Wings
Weed Cape
Energy Sword
Needler
Santa’s/Patrick’s Whip
Music Cape
Dragon Plate

All you Do to make your own is this:

Code: [Select][ITEM]itemname = Dragon Cape // (Your Item name)dropmodel = 14999 // (Hopefull you know what this is)malemodel = 14999 // “” ""malearms = 14994 // “” ""femalemodel = 14999 // “” ""femalearms = 14994 // “” ""zoom = 2000 // “” ""rotation1 = 245 // “” ""rotation2 = 80 // “” ""offset1 = -2 // “” ""offset2 = 3 // “” “”[EOF]The name of the file is the ID.

I’m Going to Upload Pictures Soon! Sorry if I didnt make that Clear above .

When you DL, You’ll get Files/Folders ect, Just Do this:

  1. Make a Folder Called “525 IP Changer” (Or w/e).
  2. Put all Files/Folders in there.
  3. Make a New one Called “User”.
  4. Put The follow Folders in there: Cache, Items, MapData, Models, Music, ScreenShots.
  5. Then in “Servers” There will be “127.0.0.1:43594”. Insert Your IP and Port, Like this:

Code: [Select]yourserver.no-ip.org:43594You can Add as many as you want but the more you add the longer it takes to start up ^^.

Here’s the DL Link:
Client v3: to be re-added. - I had to Re-Upload because DragonKing’s was on his Website, Look below o.O. (http://uppit.com/v/9AHV14TI)

CREDITS:
99%- DragonKing
1%- Me

PROOF FROM DRAGONKING (Uploading More Pics):

The NEW one I uploaded :
v3 Re-Uploaded: ~ http://uppit.com/v/9AHV14TI ~

CREDITS:
DragonKing: 80% -> 90%
Me: 20% -> 10%

I felt I gave myself too much Credit, And I DON’T Like Haters. ^^.

DRAGONSCAPE 525 IP CHANGER V3 LINK: http://uppit.com/v/9AHV14TI
I want 200+ Downloads before 1 week or I’m removing, You know what It’s like, Leachers -.-…

Read full topic
